articles.title: 3I/ATLAS mysterious video surfaces online? Alleged interstellar comet clip makes heads turn and sparks global interest as scientists look to explain anomalies
articles.description: A mysterious video of 3I/ATLAS interstellar comet has gone viral, with online users claiming it is an alien spacecraft. Astronomers, however, say the object is natural. Radio signals from 3I/ATLAS are linked to water molecule breakdown, confirming normal cometary behavior rather than alien technology.
articles.content:
Synopsis
A mysterious video of 3I/ATLAS interstellar comet has gone viral, with online users claiming it is an alien spacecraft. Astronomers, however, say the object is natural. Radio signals from 3I/ATLAS are linked to water molecule breakdown, conf... [7631 chars]

articles.title: Ascletis Announces Co-formulation of ASC36, Once-Monthly Next-Generation Amylin Receptor Agonist and ASC35, Once-Monthly Next-Generation GLP-1R/GIPR Dual Agonist for Clinical Development
articles.description: -  Using Ascletis' proprietary Ultra-Long-Acting Platform technology, co-formulation of ASC36, a once-monthly subcutaneously administered amylin receptor peptide agonist and ASC35, a once-monthly subcutaneously administered GLP-1R/GIPR dual peptide agonist, demonstrated a comparable pharmacokinetic (PK) profile to ASC36 and ASC35 dosed alone in head-to-head non-human primate studies.
articles.content: - Using Ascletis' proprietary Ultra-Long-Acting Platform technology, co-formulation of ASC36, a once-monthly subcutaneously administered amylin receptor peptide agonist and ASC35, a once-monthly subcutaneously administered GLP-1R/GIPR dual peptide ag... [6561 chars]

articles.description: Press releaseTrifork invests in legaltech company Replik to support growth, technology, and internationalization Copenhagen, November 13, 2025 – Trifork...
articles.content: Copenhagen, November 13, 2025 – Trifork Group AG has entered into a strategic partnership with Replik A/S and acquired 10% of the company. The collaboration aims to accelerate Replik’s continued growth, expand its product portfolio, and strengthen it... [4697 chars]

articles.title: Volkswagen, Rivian Eye Selling JV Tech to Other Carmakers
articles.description: Volkswagen AG and Rivian Automotive Inc. have ambitions of selling the electric vehicle technology they’re developing together to other carmakers in the future.
articles.content:
Volkswagen AG and Rivian Automotive Inc. have ambitions of selling the electric vehicle technology they’re developing together to other carmakers in the future.
The two companies’ joint venture, known as RV Tech, said it has made solid progress on de... [262 chars]

articles.title: Sustainability, innovation, and inclusivity key towards transforming J&K's apple sector: Javid Dar
articles.description: SRINAGAR, NOVEMBER 12: Minister for Agricultural Production, Rural Development & Panchayati Raj, Cooperative and Election Departments, Javid Ahmad Dar addressed the 5th Edition of CII J&K Apple Conclave 2025 here today. In his address, Minister Dar emphasized on the importance of innovation, sustainability and inclusivity in transforming Jammu and Kashmir’s apple sector. He highlighted the government’s pilot initiatives aimed at strengthening the apple industry, including the infusion of advanced technology, establishment of robust market linkages and promotion of sustainable agricultural […]
articles.content:
